channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP -- CRM (WebClient UI)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP -- CRM (WebClient UI)

item.title: CVE-2023-29189|2023-04-11T20:16:30.045Z -- sap -- crm%20%28webclient%20ui%29
item.description: SAP CRM (WebClient UI) - versions S4FND 102, 103, 104, 105, 106, 107, WEBCUIF, 700, 701, 731, 730, 746, 747, 748, 800, 801, allows an authenticated attacker to modify HTTP verbs used in requests to the web server. This application is exposed over the network and successful exploitation can lead to exposure of form fields

item.title: CVE-2023-24525|2023-04-11T21:25:50.210Z -- sap -- crm%20%28webclient%20ui%29
item.description: SAP CRM WebClient UI - versions WEBCUIF 748, 800, 801, S4FND 102, 103, does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.Â On successful exploitation an authenticated attacker can cause limited impact on confidentiality of the application.
